Question: What are the relationships and roles of the characters in 'Fifty Shades Freed'?
Options:
A. Christian and Ana are newlyweds.
B. Hyde attacks Ana out of vengeance.
C. Liz is blackmailed by Hyde.
D. All of the above

Question: Which characters are involved in the conflict surrounding Ana in *Fifty Shades Freed*?
Options:
A. Christian
B. Ana
C. Hyde
D. Liz
Answer: A) Christian, C) Hyde, D) Liz
